homeautomation.actors

Class TinkerforgeServo

  • java.lang.Object
    • homeautomation.actors.TinkerforgeServo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IActor, IServo

    public class TinkerforgeServo
extends java.lang.Object
implements IServo
    Representation of a servo attached to a Tinkerforge servo brick.
    Author:
    Philipp Jenke

    • Field Detail

      • servoBrick

        private final TinkerforgeServoBrick servoBrick
        Servo brick instance.

      • servoNumber

        private short servoNumber
        Index (port) of the servo at the Tinkerforge brick.

      • maxDegree

        private int maxDegree
        Maximum degree (+ and -) of the servos. Default is 90.

      • pulseWidthMax

        private int pulseWidthMax
        Minimum pulse width. Default: 1ms

      • pulseWidthMin

        private int pulseWidthMin
        Maximum pulse width. Default: 2ms

      • velocity

        private int velocity
        Velocity of the servo.

      • acceleration

        private int acceleration
        Accelleration of the servo.

      • period

        private int period
        Servo control period. Default: 19.5ms.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TinkerforgeServo

        public TinkerforgeServo(TinkerforgeServoBrick servoBrick,
                        int servoIndex,
                        int maxDegree,
                        int pulseWidthMin,
                        int pulseWidthMax,
                        int velocity,
                        int acceleration,
                        int period)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        servoBrick - Attached servo brick.
        servoIndex - Index of the servo at the brick.
        maxDegree - Max turning degree of the servo.
        pulseWidthMin - Minimum servo pulse width.
        pulseWidthMax - Maximum servo pulse width.
        velocity - Servo velocity.
        acceleration - Servo acceleration.
        period - Servo pwm frequency.

        Set the current position of the servo.
        Specified by:
